title: How to Reset Your Password
content:
If you've forgotten your password or need to reset it for security reasons, follow these steps:

1. Go to the login page
2. Click on 'Forgot Password?' link below the login form
3. Enter your registered email address
4. Check your email for a password reset link (arrives within 5 minutes)
5. Click the reset link in the email
6. Create a new password (must be at least 8 characters with one number)
7. Confirm your new password
8. Click 'Reset Password' to save

Note: Password reset links expire after 24 hours for security. If your link has expired, request a new one.
solutions: Use the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page
Check spam folder if reset email doesn't arrive
Ensure you're using the correct email address
Contact support if you no longer have access to your email
